Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute near Western/Jackson
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses temp rerouted SB Western, Jackson, Oakley, Van Buren, Western. NB Western, Congress, Oakley, Jackson, Western due to a fire at Western/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Western/Jackson due to a fire.

Southbound buses will operate via Western, Jackson, Oakley, Van Buren, Western.

Northbound buses will operate via Western, Congress, Oakley, Jackson, Western.

Allow extra travel time.
